mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT t3.ID_ as id, t1.ID_ AS taskId, t1.NAME_ AS taskName, t2.NAME_ AS formName, t2.TENANT_ID_ AS tenantId, t2.BUSINESS_KEY_ AS businessKey, t2.PROC_INST_ID_ AS processInstanceId, t1.CREATE_TIME_ AS startTime, t3.CUSTOM_TASK_MAX_DAY_ as customTaskMaxDay, t3.TASK_MAX_DAY_ as taskMaxDay, t3.TASK_DEF_KEY_ as taskDefinitionKey, t3.PROC_DEF_ID_ as processDefinitionId, # t3.END_TIME_ as endTime, t1.ASSIGNEE_ as assignee FROM act_ru_task t1 LEFT JOIN act_ru_execution t2 ON t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = t2.PROC_INST_ID_ and t1.EXECUTION_ID_ = t2.ID_ LEFT JOIN act_ru_extension_task t3 ON T1.ID_ = t3.TASK_ID_ and t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = t3.PROC_INST_ID_ WHERE t1.PROC_INST_ID_ = #{processInstanceId} and t2.PARENT_ID_ is not null

SELECT t1.ID_ AS id, t1.TASK_ID_ as taskId, t1.PROC_INST_ID_ as processInstanceId, t1.CREATE_TIME_ as startTime FROM act_ru_extension_task t1 WHERE PROC_INST_ID_ = #{processInstanceId} and TASK_ID_ = #{taskId}
